summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of alley, Block 49, David S. Maynard's Plat, being the alley between Maynard Avenue and 7th Avenue South, from King Street to Weller Street, by paving and grading, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7656 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
